price: Lut kaa sε: “Me Wura Nyankopͻn, boa me ma meni nsεmmͻnedifoͻ yi so nkonim. “
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرۡنِي عَلَى ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi unṣur'nī ʿalā al-qawmi al-muf'sidīna
